alert.note: Alert for Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 20 at 3:59PM CDT until August 20 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Henry County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 359 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Columbia, or 11 miles west of Blakely, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Haleburg, Barnes, Tumbleton, Dancey, Miller, Hardwickburg, Hayes and Balkum. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
